# Generated by Django 4.0.6 on 2023-05-11 20:34

from django.db import migrations, models
from django.utils.text import slugify


def replace_invalid_usernames(apps, schema_editor):
    """
    Convert previous usernames that could have included invalid characters
    e.g. underscores, @, $ or Capital letters
    Converted usernames should only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens.
    """

    User = apps.get_model("users", "User")
    for user in User.objects.all():
        user.username = slugify(user.username)
        user.save()


class Migration(migrations.Migration):

    dependencies = [
        ('users', '0019_alter_user_username'),
    ]

    operations = [
        migrations.RunPython(replace_invalid_usernames),
    ]
